text: Enrique Valentín Iglesias García (born 29 March 1930) is a Spanish economist and politician. He was born in Arancedo, Asturias. Iglesias once was president of the Inter-American Development Bank. He was appointed as Special Adviser for Venezuela to Federica Mogherini, the European Union's High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy and Vice-President of the European Commission, on 28 May 2019. ==Related pages== *List of scientists from South America ==References== ==Other websites== * IDB: Enrique Iglesias * Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan politicians Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish economists
title: Enrique V. Iglesias
